content: this crochet poncho is made from simple squares that start from the center and grow outward creating a calm mandala-inspired design a border is added at the end and you can easily make the poncho larger by working a few extra rounds it s a flexible project that suits many body types you can join just four squares for a quick version shape a rounder neckline for a better fit or even add a hood for extra comfort measurements hood square side 39 46 46 cm / 15 6 18 4 18 4 body square side 39 46 53 cm / 15 6 18 4 21 2 length from shoulders to lower peak 70 84 94 cm / 27 5 33 6 37 6 materials 3 4 5 cakes of tea time color 06 crochet hook 5 5 mm / us i-9 stitch markers scissors tape measure
